page.title: 06A Teacher's Day
page.content: I enter the school at five past eight. I unlock the classroom door and prepare work for the coming day. Preparation includes chalkboard, overhead projector, video and paperwork. Some marking of books and tidying takes place before school. The duty teacher will blow a whistle for start of school at five to nine. The children walk into class and work on set individual exercises until Assembly. Afterwards I will teach and assist with supervised set subjects until break at half past ten. Break lasts fifteen minutes and lessons continue until 12.00 lunchtime. Afternoon work continues from 1 p.m. to 3.20 during which time practical activities take place. After school I might run a club or attend a staff meeting. {T.G.Brightwell}
